search.name: Pricewatch Search
search.description: Street Price Search Engine for computer related items. Search through some categories with these codes: 'mb' for motherboards, 'cpu' for processors, 'ram' for RAM, 'hd' for Hard Drives, 'cd' for CD-ROM drives, 'v' for Video Cards, 's' for Sound Cards, 'cdrw' for CD Recorders, 'dvd' for DVD drives, 'fd' for Floppy drives, 'mon' for Monitors, 'case' for Cases, 'ps' for Power Supplies, and 'bb' for PC Bare Bones kits. Example: "pw cpu:Athlon XP 1900"
